text: This is a list of French football transfers for the 2015 summer transfer window. Only moves featuring Ligue 1 or Ligue 2 are listed. ==Ligue 1== Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules. title: List of French football transfers summer 2015
